DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of gemcabene on the pharmacokinetics of simvastatin 80 mg.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Gemcabene on the Pharmacokinetics of Simvastatin in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Males and Females >18 years of age Body weight 45 kg or greater If female, of childbearing potential or lactation History of significant adverse reaction to any fibrate lipidlowering agent or HMGCoA reductase inhibitor
